content.data:
[Y]Platform Lab
[W]Jump arcs decide the mood.
[c][m.]
[W]Animation and collision tuning matter
[W]more than huge sprite counts.
[W]Difficulty curves should teach first
[W]and challenge second.
[c][m.]
[G]- Predictable jumps.
[G]- Consistent enemy tells.
[G]- Readable hazards.
[m][m-]
[Y]DID YOU KNOW?
[C]Players forgive hard levels, not
[C]unfair rules.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
